comments:
Build ID: I20070525-1350

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Set up a JBoss 4.0 or 4.2 runtime
2. Attempt to create a server using the runtime
3. Enter a custom server configuration name
4. Press Finish - the dialogue does not disappear and no server is created


More information:
The Eclipse .log shows:
